/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant red and yellow signage, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
